Text: RE NDA Cc A two way agreement certainly makes sense I will be back to you shortly robert Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday November PM To reditBcom Cc Subject NDA Dear Robert Craig Chaney asked me to review the proposed NDA that you forwarded to him in anticipation of a meeting between Credit B and EnronCreditcom early next week The NDA that you forwarded to Craig protects only Credit B as a disclosing party After discussing this matter with Craig I understand that this relationship might rapidly evolve and require EnronCreditcom to disclose confidential information to Credit B as well Accordingly I propose that in the interests of efficiency we negotiate and finalize a bilateral NDA up front I have thus prepared the attached bilateral NDA for your review and comment I have taken Enrons standard form of NDA and incorporated those provisions of CreditBs NDA to which I can agree I look forward to discussing any comments or concerns that you may have Craig would like to finalize this NDA by Friday Regards Leslie M Hansen Senior Counsel See attached file Credit B NDAdoc
Reciprocal Confidentiality Agreement Cc the changes look worse than they are I hope these are acceptable to you robert NDA with Enrondoc NDA with Enrondoc
RE NDA Cc fully executed I will fax a copy to your attention and you can distribute to your people as needed thanks for all your help Robert
